parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Accelerate",
  "details": {
    "framework": "PyTorch",
    "library": "Accelerate",
    "resource_requirements": {
      "gpu": 8,
      "nodes": "multiple",
      "partition": "production-cluster",
      "exclusive": true,
      "output_path": "/fsx/h4/logs/%x-%j.out",
      "error_path": "/fsx/h4/logs/%x-%j.err",
      "environment": "conda handbook"
    },
    "configuration": {
      "gradient_accumulation_steps": "parsed from config_$PRECISION.yaml",
      "world_size": "calculated based on nodes and GPUs per node",
      "master_addr": "SLURM_JOB_NODELIST's first entry",
      "master_port": 6000,
      "nccl_async_error_handling": 1,
      "nccl_proto": "simple",
      "rdmav_fork_safe": 1,
      "fi_efa_fork_safe": 1,
      "fi_efa_use_device_rdma": 1,
      "fi_provider": "efa",
      "fi_log_level": 1,
      "nccl_ib_disable": 1,
      "nccl_socket_ifname": "ens"
    },
    "launch_command": "srun --wait=60 --kill-on-bad-exit=1 --jobid $SLURM_JOB_ID bash -c \"$LAUNCHER --role \$SLURMD_NODENAME: $CMD\" 2>&1",
    "script_purpose": "training a model using Accelerate with DeepSpeed"
  }
}
```
